sentences.sContent: Whether you call it spit-up, puke or barf mulch, there’s simply no denying the fact that every article of clothing you own will eventually start to smell like baby vomit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether you call it spit-up, puke or barf mulch, there’s simply no denying the fact that every article of clothing you own will eventually start to smell like baby vomit.
sentences.sCn: 不管你管他叫吐出来的东西还是呕吐物什么的，不可否认的是你身上的每件东西都开始闻起来像婴儿呕吐物。

trans.tranCn: 呕吐, 呕吐物, 吐剂
trans.tranOther: food brought back up from your stomach through your mouth
